In England, in the seven days to 09 July, there were 192,239 new confirmed cases (341.5 new cases per 100,000). In the seven days to 02 July, there were 142,258 new cases and so the new cases have risen by 35% (49,981 extra cases). The number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in England so far as at 14 July is 4,550,298 (8,084.1 cases per 100,000 population).
